pyLiveKML.KML.KML¶

Module Attributes

KML_UPDATE_CONTAINER_LIMIT_DEFAULT

The default maximum number of Features that will be included in a NetworkLinkControl's <Update> tag.

kml_header

The XML tag that opens any XML document, including any KML document.

Functions

kml_tag()

Construct the opening <kml> tag, with namespaces, for a KML document.

Classes

AltitudeMode(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <altitudeMode> tags, used in Placemark objects, etc

ColorMode(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <colorMode> tags, specifically for objects that derive from ColorStyle

DisplayMode(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <displayMode> tags, specifically for BalloonStyle objects

ItemIconMode(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <ItemIcon><state> tags, specifically for ListStyle objects

ListItemType(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <listItemType> tags, specifically for ListStyle objects

RefreshMode(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <refreshMode> tags, specifically for Link objects

State(value)

Enumeration of possible states that objects derived from KML Object may hold

StyleState(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <Pair><key> tags, specifically for StyleMap objects

UnitsEnum(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <unitsEnum> tags, specifically for Vec2 instances in e.g.

Vec2Type(value)

Enumeration of possible sub-types for KML Vec2 objects

ViewRefreshMode(value)

Enumeration of options for KML <viewRefreshMode> tags, specifically for Link objects
